subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Daniel Brière had a goal and two assists, and Chris Drury, Derek Roy and Jason Pominville each added a goal and an assist last night for the Buffalo Sabres in a 6-3 victory over the visiting Philadelphia Flyers.
snippet: Daniel Brière had a goal and two assists, and Chris Drury, Derek Roy and Jason Pominville each added a goal and an assist last night for the Buffalo Sabres in a 6-3 victory over the visiting Philadelphia Flyers.
